{"id":1113016126,"question_id":3019,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1701793618,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1113016126/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Furthest Point From Origin","memory":"41.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int furthestDistanceFromOrigin(String moves) {\n\n        int p = 0; \n        int count = 0;\n\n        for (int i=0; i<moves.length(); i++)\n        {\n            switch (moves.charAt(i))\n            {\n                case 'L':\n                    p--;\n                    count++;\n                    break;\n                case 'R':\n                    p++;\n                    count++;\n                    break;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return Math.abs(p) + (moves.length() - count);\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"furthest-point-from-origin","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
